title: Drawing, "Design for Ark Curtain, Beth Am Synagogue, Los Altos, California", 1968–69
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on cream cardboard
signed: Signed in graphite on old cardboard mat, lower right:  T. Guermonprez'68
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite on old cardboard mat, lower left:  T.I.; in pen and black ink on white label, lower right verso of mat:  CURTAIN FOR TEMPEL [sic]/BETH AM..LOS ALTOS/SILK/BROCADING/1968/69
provenance: Eric Elsesser, California; 1993: acquired by Museum
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: White curtain with Hebrew inscription in gray, running horizontally across the lower third of curtain. Interspersed through inscription are colored objects including a  six-pointed star, menorah, and [possibly] a breast-plate.  [Hebrew inscription to be translated.]

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Design for Ark Curtain, Beth Am Synagogue, Los Altos, California", 1968–69. Brush and gouache, graphite on cream cardboard. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-72.
